title: Amenable Banach algebra
summary: In mathematics, specifically in functional analysis, a Banach algebra, A,  is amenable if all bounded derivations from A into dual Banach A-bimodules are inner (that is of the form a ↦ a . x − x . a {\displaystyle a\mapsto a.x-x.a} for some x {\displaystyle x} in the dual module).
